definitions.description: The carbon footprint of a product with values in accordance with the Pathfinder Framework.

constantValues: The carbon footprint of a product with values in accordance with the Pathfinder Framework.

members.name: sustainabilityproductfootprintId
members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: createdOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

members.name: modifiedOn
members.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was modified.

members.name: statecode
members.description: Status of the (Preview) Sustainability product footprint

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statecode_display' is added to the 'PreviewSustainabilityProductFootprint' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statecode'
supportingAttribute.name: statecode_display

constantValues: Status of the (Preview) Sustainability product footprint

members.name: statuscode
members.description: Reason for the status of the (Preview) Sustainability product footprint

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statuscode_display' is added to the 'PreviewSustainabilityProductFootprint' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statuscode'
supportingAttribute.name: statuscode_display

constantValues: Reason for the status of the (Preview) Sustainability product footprint

members.name: importSequenceNumber
members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn
members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
members.description: For internal use only.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the custom entity.

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.name: comment
members.description: The additional information related to the PCF. While product table description contains product-level information, comment should be used for PCF-related information.

constantValues: The additional information related to the PCF. While product table description contains product-level information, comment should be used for PCF-related information.

members.name: company
members.description: The company that is the data owner.

constantValues: The company that is the data owner.

members.name: specversion
members.description: The version of the Pathfinder Framework data specification being used.

constantValues: The version of the Pathfinder Framework data specification being used.

members.name: footprintstatus
members.description: The default status of a product footprint is Active. A product footprint with status Deprecated shouldn't be used, for example, product footprint calculations by data recipients.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

supportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'footprintstatus_display' is added to the 'PreviewSustainabilityProductFootprint' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'footprintstatus'
supportingAttribute.name: footprintstatus_display

constantValues: The default status of a product footprint is Active. A product footprint with status Deprecated shouldn't be used, for example, product footprint calculations by data recipients.

members.name: statuscomment
members.description: If defined, the value should be a message explaining the reason for the current status.

constantValues: If defined, the value should be a message explaining the reason for the current status.

members.name: sustainabilityproduct
members.description: The product this footprint is for.

constantValues: The product this footprint is for.

members.name: sustainabilityproductcarbonfootprint
members.description: The carbon footprint of the given product.

constantValues: The carbon footprint of the given product.

members.name: validityperiodend
members.description: The end (exclusive) of the valid period of the PCF. Reference the description of validity period start and the Pathfinder Framework for further details.

constantValues: The end (exclusive) of the valid period of the PCF. Reference the description of validity period start and the Pathfinder Framework for further details.

members.name: validityperiodstart
members.description: The start of the validity period, which is the interval during which the PCF is declared as valid for use by a data recipient. Reference the Pathfinder Framework for further details.

constantValues: The start of the validity period, which is the interval during which the PCF is declared as valid for use by a data recipient. Reference the Pathfinder Framework for further details.

members.name: version
members.description: The version of the product footprint with value an integer in the inclusive range of 0 to (2^31)-1.

constantValues: The version of the product footprint with value an integer in the inclusive range of 0 to (2^31)-1.

members.name: origincorrelationid
members.description: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.

constantValues: An optional identifier to correlate record with data origin.
